basics.name: Supakone Kongprapan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Computer Engineering student with a love for Software Development, Cloud Computing, and Operating Systems. (I use Archlinux btw).

highlights: Designed and implemented entire Report Generator Application using Vanilla JS and FastAPI.
Developed core web application using Vue.js, Jinja2, and FastAPI.
Maintained production quality using Docker, Linux, and Git.
Developed Backend Stock-related Service with microservice architecture (Golang, RabbitMQ, Redis).
Implemented cron jobs using Apache Airflow.
Maintained project quality with intensive Unit and E2E testing.

projects.name: Depositee Management Service
projects.description: Microservice Architecture class project. Designed scalable backend systems.

projects.name: The Petpal
projects.description: Web app matching pet lovers with service providers using Golang and Next.js.
